extendedInfo.description: A stunning live wallpaper of shining and drifting hearts. Make you and your lover full of sweet and romance. â¥ Shining color and stunning styles.â¥ Touch hearts to fluoresce them.â¥ 8 different themes.â¥ Background can be customized.â¥ Fully customized option.â¥ Totally FreeHow To Use: HOME->Press Menu->Wallpapers-LiveWallpaperNot all handsets support the live wallpaper feature, please check for a 'live wallpaper' category as the directions above state.

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Its an amazing app!! U HAVE to get it if u dont ur a loser then! Jkjkjk :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must have!
reviews.comment: Gorgeous!! I love this wallpaper. I love the options & that you can use your own photo. One of my favourites, excellent job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Customize background was the best idea!!! I can now put a pic of my choice n looks so adorable, but hope u can fix where fit pic the way u want it :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Lovely Live Wallpaper
reviews.comment: I really like this wall paper. It\'s great for Valentines Day with some very beautiful backgrounds. And for any time of the year, you can put your own picture on the background and let the hearts of love fly.
reviews.author: Vickie Carey

reviews.comment: I like this LW. But when I put the picture It\'s cut =( .. I don\'t want it to be scrollable. I have some of my own picture that it fixed on It\'s own size for not scrollable please add an option like that or even to adjust how much we can crop on the photo. Thanks I\'ll be looking forward for that
reviews.author: shelly x

reviews.title: Te Amo background the best!
reviews.comment: Wonderful LWP that made Valentine\'s Day\'s lunch with my Dominican-born hubby a treat last year!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Malfunction
reviews.comment: Background turns into a still with no hearts. I just downloaded this a few hours ago :(

reviews.title: Samsung Epic 4g
reviews.comment: Love the fact you can pick your own picture or one of there themes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: custom background
reviews.comment: The photo I was gonna use didn\'t quite turn out as well as I was expecting, the editor blew it up by nearly 300% its original size. Resizing the image to the recommended dimensions might yield better looking results, but I kinda doubt it. Search \"floating heart live wallpaper\" for better alternatives.
reviews.author: Tim Bruton

reviews.title: Locks up constantly
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper but lately my phone reboots constantly & I have to rest this wallpaper. Please fix as it\'s my favorite live wallpaper, but I\'m not using it anymore!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!!
